org.fujion.component

Class ServerScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.component.BaseComponent
      • org.fujion.component.BaseSourcedComponent
        • org.fujion.component.BaseScriptComponent

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IElementIdentifier

    @Component(tag="sscript",
           widgetClass="MetaWidget",
           content=AS_ATTRIBUTE,
           parentTag="*")
public class ServerScript
extends BaseScriptComponent
    A component wrapping script source code for server-side invocation.

    • Method Detail

      • onAttach

        protected void onAttach(Page page)
        Triggers script execution. If not deferred, execution is immediate. Otherwise, a event is posted, deferring script execution until the end of the execution cycle.
        Overrides:
        onAttach in class BaseComponent
        Parameters:
        page - The attached page.
        See Also:
        BaseComponent.onAttach(org.fujion.component.Page)
